overview: The long afternoons mark the last stage of a relationship. Like a doll she always wanted to have, Josy takes care of her mother. Her sleek body and her features, which blend into the masculine and feminine, mark her personality. Her mother, a lady debilitated by a degenerative disease, which confuses the real and the imaginary, has never had a relationship as close to that son as now, which depends on him.
title: No Fim de Tudo
